welcome:
Welcome to the IntervalCards Telegram Bot!
Here you will can add words and receive messages with random word from your words periodically.
Please, use 'â˜° Menu' â¼ '/instruction' for more information
If you wish to add word â€” please go to 'Add word' menu.

instruction.title: This bot helps you to learn words:
instruction.step1: 1. Firstly, add several words You want to learn (use the '{{addWordButton}}' button).
instruction.step2: 2. Press '{{startLearnButton}}' button to start learning process.
instruction.info1: â¦¿ Every 1 hour You will get 1 word from your words while you in the learning process.
instruction.info2: â¦¿ This will continue from 9:00 (9:00 a.m.) to 22:00 (10:00 p.m.).
instruction.info3: â¦¿ If you want to stop learn â€” just press '{{stopLearnButton}}' button.
instruction.info4: â¦¿ If you want to remove word â€” go out from learning mode, press '{{stopLearnButton}}' button, remove unnecessary words and start learning mode again.
instruction.info5: â¦¿ You can get all of your word by pressing '{{showAllButton}}' button.

interval.current: You have already set interval to {{interval}} hours.
interval.prompt:
Here You can set interval for learning.
Please, chose the interval you want to set.
interval.set: You have set interval to {{interval}} hours.

addWord.prompt: Please, type your word and press 'Enter' or send button. You can add translation via / separator. For example: my word / my translation
